direction: Use CatBoost with the following settings: iterations=950, learning_rate=0.014, depth=7. For preprocessing, fill numeric NaN values with the median, and pass categorical features using the cat_features parameter. Ensure all categorical columns are cast to string type before training to avoid dtype issues.
executor_guidance: Ensure that all categorical columns are cast to string type before passing them to CatBoost to prevent dtype errors. Do not use get_dummies for categorical columns; instead, use the cat_features parameter.
